>
[Creative Prodigy](/Feats.aspx?ID=2532) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ganzi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=339" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 96 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have a powerful creative drive, useful for prevarication and performance. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12). If you are already trained in either of these skills, you become trained in a skill of your choice in its place. You also become trained in [Art Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
name: Creative Prodigy
